user_query: I'm planning a trip to Paris with my family. Can you help me search for flights from New York to Paris with a layover in London? We prefer business class seats. Also, provide me with information about vacation rentals in Paris for the dates of our stay.

TaskList.description: Search for flights from New York to Paris with a layover in London, focusing on business class options.
Retrieve information on vacation rentals in Paris for the specified dates.
